title: SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair-Backrest and Seat Height Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support(Gray)-Fabric
descriptions:
**SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest - Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair**

**Experience the Ultimate in Gaming Comfort**

Take your gaming experience to the next level with our SITMOD Gaming Chair, designed to provide the ultimate in comfort and support. This ergonomic video game chair features a sturdy frame, soft and high-density cushions, and adjustable lumbar support to ensure long hours of gaming or office work without fatigue.

**Key Features:**

* **Ergonomic Design**: Our chair is designed to promote good posture and reduce strain on your back and neck.
* **360° Swivel**: Move freely and easily in any direction without restrictions.
* **90°-150° Recline**: Adjust the chair to your desired position for optimal comfort.
* **Retractable Footrest**: Take a break and put your feet up with our convenient footrest.
* **Adjustable Armrest**: Enjoy comfortable support for your arms and elbows.
* **Adjustable Lumbar Support**: Customize the chair to fit your unique needs.
* **Up to 300 lbs Weight Capacity**: Built to last and support heavy users.

**Product Specifications:**

* **Color:** Gray
* **Material:** Durable fabric with a sturdy steel frame and heavy-duty nylon base
* **Dimensions:** Overall: 23 inches (width) x 20 inches (depth) x 49-52 inches (height), Seat Panel: 20.5 inches (width) x 20.8 inches (depth), Back Panel: 22 inches (width) x 32.6 inches (height)
* **Certifications:** SGS certified 4-level cylinder for added safety and durability

**Warranty and Support:**

* **Customer Satisfaction Guarantee**: Return the chair with no questions asked if you're not satisfied.
* **Free Part Replacement**: Get replacement parts for free if anything breaks.
* **Contact Support**: Our dedicated support team is here to help with any questions or concerns.

**Recommended Use:**

* Gaming
* Office work

**Assembly Required:**

Please note that assembly is required for this product. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us.

**Order Now and Experience the Ultimate in Gaming Comfort!**
